name: Cool bat wings for your doll
description:
Cool bat wings for Waldorf style dolls! 

Made with slinky fabric and lined with felt. They slip on easily using the stretchy elastic loops.  Just put your dolls arms through the loops and soar. 

You can almost see them move!

If no color preference is mentioned we'll send black.

Indicate your color preference of Blue, Black, Pink, Green, Silver or Gold in the note to seller at check-out! 

Shipping charges are estimated so overcharges of more than $1 are refunded.  Thanks for your patience with this. 

These wings are shown on our 16 inch doll from Piccoli Dolls. Doll not included.  

PLEASE NOTE: Bat wings take 3 to 5 business days to ship!  All wings handmade for you; one pair at a time.

name: Cool bat wings for your child, soft flexible play wings, kids wings
description:
Every pair is handmade by me so they may vary slightly from stated measurements and the set of wings shown in the pictures.

Cool bat wings from Blissality for your child to play in! 

I made these kid-sized soft wings with slinky fabric and lined them with interfaced felt.  Put your child's arms through the loops and heâ€™s ready to soar. (Girls like them too! ) 

Matching set of wings for your child's doll available in our shop!

INTERNATIONAL shipping; please contact me for a special listing. 

These are soft, flexible wings to allow for easy movement and comfort, they are not stiff. If you think your child needs less or more room between the arm loops, or roomier loops, please convo for a special listing.

These handmade wings take 3 to 5 business days to ship.

Please use with adult supervision; they are not intended for children under 3.

About 31 by 14 inches with the arm loops 12 inches apart. 


Custom colors are available but may take a few days longer to ship. If you are purchasing more than two pairs of wings please convo for a special listing to save on shipping costs.



The beautiful children modeling my wings are not included in this listing ;) Many thanks to Catherine for the wonderful pictures.

name: upcycled distressed denim jeans
description:
These jeans were upcycled from a pair of distressed denim pants.  Inseam 4.25 inches, made to fit our 16 inch Piccoli doll. 

Like our facebook page for giveaways and special offers!

name: denim jeans for 16 inch doll
description:
These cotton jeans were made to fit our 16 inch Piccoli doll. Inseam approximately 4.25" 

Elasticized waist for easy dressing.
